name: Space Out (itch)
description:
Two-Button Shoot-em-up

Due to limitations of the jam, the game buttons can't be selected with the mouse position. Use S or Right-mouse click to select, and Space or Left-mouse click to activate.

Controls

S or Right-mouse click
- Tap: Flip direction
- Hold: Stop

Space or Left-mouse click
- Tap: Shoot
- Hold: Charge

Made in less than a week for 8 Bits to Infinity ~ Two Button Jam using the theme music Lights Out. Made in Unity 2018.3.12f1, sounds with Bfxr 1.4.1.

Contains music ©2019 Joshua McLean (mrjoshuamclean.com) Licensed under Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International

Contains fonts ©2014 Emmeran RICHARD (www.emmeranrichard.fr)

Contains assets (graphics and sounds) by Kenney (www.kenney.nl) Licensed under Creative Commons CC0 1.0 Universal

Source code available on GitHub.

v0.2 - Balanced the game a bit better
